title: Commit Your Code Conference 2025
html:
Thank you for attending my talk: Demystifying Deployments as a Service.

Here are some services you can use to get started building your own pipelines! This is by no mean an exhaustive list of tools, just something to get you started. If there is something missing you think should be here, reach out to me on my socials here: brianmm.dev

Helpful resources

Here are some resources I‚Äôve created over the years that you can use to learn more about automated deployments.

This is just a small selection of the 180+ pieces of content I‚Äôve created over the years. More can be found on my Content page or YouTube channel.

  • ‚úçÔ∏è¬†Use a Makefile to run Vite and Express at the same time - make is an amazing tool for executing scripts with a single command. Leans into the scripting topic of the talk.
  • ‚úçÔ∏è¬†Streamline Docker development with Makefiles - Another great example of how to use make.
  • ‚úçÔ∏è¬†Rearchitecting the Front End of GuardianForge - This article outlines how I configured routing requests to different S3 apps using CloudFront.
  • ‚úçÔ∏è¬†Automate Deployments to AWS with GitHub Actions - Self explainitory.
  • ‚úçÔ∏è¬†Deploy to Netlify with GitHub Actions - A great starting point if you want to dip your toe into building a CI pipeline.
  • üé•¬†Use GitHub Actions to deploy a Node.js project to a VPS - If you want to deploy to a VPS using GitHub Actions.
  • üé•¬†Unlocking the power of GitHub Actions - Great guide on building your first workflow.

Services

Below is a categorized list of different services you can use to help automate deployments.

Orchestration

  • Flight Control
  • AWS CodePipeline
  • GitHub Actions
  • Azure Pipelines
  • CircleCI
  • Jenkins
  • Octopus Deploy
  • GitLab CI

File hosing/storage

  • AWS S3
  • Azure Storage Accounts
  • GitHub Pages
  • Digital Ocean Spaces

CDN

  • CloudFlare
  • AWS Cloudfront
  • Azure CDN
  • Google Cloud CDN

Backend code execution

  • AWS Lambda
  • CloudFlare Workers
  • Azure Functions
  • Google Cloud Functions

Routing

  • AWS CloudFront
  • AWS API Gateway
  • Azure API Management

Authentication

  • AWS Cognito
  • Azure AD
  • Clerk.dev

Infrastructure as code tools

  • AWS SAM
  • AWS CloudFormation
  • Azure ARM
  • Pulumi
  • SST
  • Serverless Framework
  • Terraform
